A Quarto extension providing two polished reveal.js presentation themes with a shared layout architecture. Both themes include slide types, emphasis classes, callouts, font sizing utilities, styled tables, and citation support — all from a single install.

## Themes

:::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="50%"}
### Academic

Clean, institution-neutral design with a navy/slate palette.

```yaml
format:
  dtslides-revealjs:
    slide-number: c/t
```

[Live Demo](example-academic.qmd){.btn .btn-primary}
:::

::: {.column width="50%"}
### UNM

University of New Mexico branding with a cherry/turquoise palette.

```yaml
format:
  dtslides-unm-revealjs:
    slide-number: c/t
```

[Live Demo](example.qmd){.btn .btn-primary}
:::

::::

## Install

```bash
quarto add Data-Wise/dtslides
```

This installs both themes under `_extensions/`. Requires Quarto >= 1.6.0.

## Features at a Glance

| Feature | Description |
|---------|-------------|
| **Slide types** | `.small-slide`, `.tiny-slide`, `.quote-slide`, `.image-slide`, `.section-slide`, `.slide-code`, `.scrollable` |
| **Emphasis** | `.alert`, `.fg`, `.bg`, `.highlight`, `.note`, `.warning` |
| **Callouts** | `.callout-example`, `.callout-question`, `.callout-insight` + standard Quarto callouts |
| **Font sizing** | `.largest` through `.smallest` — scales code blocks too |
| **Alignment** | `.left`, `.center`, `.right`, `.v-center`, `.v-top`, `.v-bottom` |
| **Extras** | `.button`, `.badge`, styled tables, citation support with auto-shrink references |

See the [Reference](reference.qmd) for full documentation and the [Getting Started](getting-started.qmd) guide for installation and customization.

## Architecture

Both themes import a shared `_shared.scss` partial (~765 lines) containing all color-agnostic layout rules. Each theme defines only its color variables, then `@import '_shared'` pulls in the full layout. The UNM theme's `_shared.scss` is a symlink to the academic theme's canonical copy — one source of truth for both themes.

```text
_extensions/
├── dtslides/           # Academic theme
│   └── styles/
│       ├── academic.scss    ← color variables (navy/slate)
│       └── _shared.scss     ← shared layout (765 lines)
└── dtslides-unm/       # UNM theme
    └── styles/
        ├── custom.scss      ← color variables (cherry/turquoise)
        └── _shared.scss     ← symlink → dtslides/styles/_shared.scss
```
